GPT UPDATE

You are going to update GPT (GUID Partition Table) on the device.
Please, choose file from your local hard drive and click Update GPT button.

WARNINGS
  • do not power off the device during update
  • if everything goes well, the device will restart
  • you can upload whatever you want, so be sure that you choose proper GPT image for your device
  • updating GPT is a very dangerous operation and may damage your device!
You can find more information about this project on GitHub
uboot2.0 version:20.05.22
